mapper.select: SELECT book.book_no, book.book_name, book.book_cover, book.book_preface, book.book_date, book.mem_no, m.mem_no, m.mem_id, m.mem_nickname, m.profile_photo, m.profile_cont FROM (SELECT * FROM book ORDER BY book_no DESC)book INNER JOIN member m ON book.mem_no = m.mem_no

SELECT book.book_no, book.book_name, book.book_cover, book.book_date, book.mem_no, m.mem_no, m.mem_id, m.mem_nickname FROM (SELECT * FROM book ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM)book INNER JOIN member m ON book.mem_no = m.mem_no WHERE rowNum <=9

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, X.* FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT bk.book_no, bk.book_name, bk.book_cover, bk.book_date, m.mem_id, m.mem_nickname FROM book bk INNER JOIN member m ON m.mem_no = bk.mem_no INNER JOIN board bd ON m.mem_no = bd.mem_no AND bk.book_no = bd.book_no WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(bk.book_name,#{q},'i') OR REGEXP_LIKE(m.mem_nickname,#{q},'i') OR REGEXP_LIKE(bd.bo_title,#{q},'i') OR REGEXP_LIKE(bd.bo_cont,#{q},'i') AND m.mem_state = 0 AND bo_lock=1 GROUP BY bk.book_no, bk.book_name, bk.book_cover, bk.book_date, m.mem_id, m.mem_nickname) ORDER BY REGEXP_COUNT(book_name,#{q}) DESC, REGEXP_COUNT(mem_nickname,#{q}) DESC)X) WHERE RN <=6

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, X.* FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT bk.book_no, bk.book_name, bk.book_cover, bk.book_date, m.mem_id, m.mem_nickname FROM book bk INNER JOIN member m ON m.mem_no = bk.mem_no INNER JOIN board bd ON m.mem_no = bd.mem_no AND bk.book_no = bd.book_no WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(bk.book_name,#{q},'i') OR REGEXP_LIKE(m.mem_nickname,#{q},'i') OR REGEXP_LIKE(bo_title,#{q},'i') OR REGEXP_LIKE(bo_cont,#{q},'i') AND m.mem_state = 0 AND bo_lock=1 GROUP BY bk.book_no, bk.book_name, bk.book_cover, bk.book_date, m.mem_id, m.mem_nickname) ORDER BY REGEXP_COUNT(book_name,#{q}) DESC, REGEXP_COUNT(mem_nickname,#{q}) DESC)X) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{n}+1) AND (#{n}+6)

SELECT m.mem_id, m.mem_nickname, m.profile_photo, m.profile_cont, b.bo_no, b.bo_title, b.bo_cont, b.bo_thumbnail, b.bo_color, b.bo_date FROM board b INNER JOIN member m ON b.book_no = #{book_no} AND m.mem_id = #{mem_id} ORDER BY b.book_order

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN,X.* FROM (SELECT book.book_no, book.book_name, book.book_cover, book.book_preface, book.book_date, book.book_editdate, book.cat_name, book.mem_no as book_mem_no, m.mem_no as m_mem_no, m.mem_id, m.mem_nickname FROM (SELECT * FROM book ORDER BY book_date DESC)book INNER JOIN member m ON book.mem_no = m.mem_no WHERE m.mem_no = #{mem_no} ) X) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{n}+1) AND (#{n}+6)
